name: J1939-84 Heavy Duty Vehicle OBD test
short_description: This project is an Open-Source (GPL) implementation of the SAE J1939-84 test specification. It tests compliance with heavy duty OBD protocols. THIS COMPUTER PROGRAM IS BASED UPON SAE TECHNICAL REPORT J1939-84, WHICH REPORT WAS PROVIDED "AS IS".
summary: Open-Source (GPL) implementation of SAE J1939-84 heavy duty test
